title: Inside the Parker - Jackie Robinson Day, Tatis Bounceback, L.A, Bauer Outage, Red Sox Rollin -- Guest: 7-Time All-Star Dave Parker
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Jackie Robinson Day, Tatis Bounceback, L.A, Bauer Outage, Red Sox Rollin -- Guest: 7-Time All-Star Dave Parker
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob looks at the significance of Jackie Robinson Day, if Padres slugger Fernando Tatis, Jr. is returning too soon from a dislocated left shoulder, why Trevor Bauer has been better than average for the Dodgers. Also, the Analytic Stat of the Day, Betting on the Bases, and Foul or Fair.

Guests: 7-time All-Star Dave Parker discusses his new book Cobra, his favorite teams, and what he feels was his signature moment. MLBBro.com writer David Grubb discusses the launch of the new website covering black and brown major leaguers, and the early season explosion of Byron Buxton.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
